title: How to Subscribe to Snapchat+ in 4 Easy Steps

steps.title: Go to your profile.
steps.content: Go to your profile. Open up your Snapchat app and tap your profile icon in the top left.

steps.title: Tap the Snapchat+ banner card.
steps.content: Tap the Snapchat+ banner card. Midway down the page you should see a banner card advertising Snapchat+. Tap this banner to begin the Snapchat+ subscription process. [1] X Research source If you don’t see the Snapchat+ banner, try dismissing the other banner cards in your profile to see it. Currently Snapchat+ is only available to users in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, France, Germany, Australia, New Zealand, Saudi Arabia, and the United Arab Emirates. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Choose a subscription.
steps.content: Choose a subscription. Select which subscription model you’d prefer. In the US, Snapchat+ is $3.99 per month, but you can pay an annual fee of $29.99 which saves you 37% per year. Snapchat+ may be priced differently in different countries.

steps.title: Restart Snapchat to get access to your subscription.
steps.content: Restart Snapchat to get access to your subscription. If you don’t see your Snapchat+ features available after subscribing, restart the app for them to appear.

steps.title: Snapchat+ comes with a lot of features that can enhance your Snapchat experience.
steps.content: Snapchat+ comes with a lot of features that can enhance your Snapchat experience. [3] X Research source These features do change from time to time, but the features currently included are: Best Friends Forever (Pin as #1 Best Friend) Story Rewatch Indicator Custom App Icons Custom App Theme Editor Snapchat+ Badge Friend Solar System Priority Story Replies Post View Emojis Bitmoji Backgrounds Story Timer Capturing Color Custom Notification Sounds Friend Snapscore Change Chat Wallpapers Custom Capture Buttons Gift Snapchat+ Story Boost Map Appearance
